## Quality Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code compiles without errors: `npm run compile`
- [ ] Code compiles without warnings
- [ ] Code follows style guide
- [ ] Variable names are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Comments explain complex logic
- [ ] No debugging code left in (console.log, etc.)

### Testing
- [ ] All tests pass: `npm run test`
- [ ] Test coverage >80%
- [ ] Success cases tested
- [ ] Edge cases covered
- [ ] Error cases tested
- [ ] Security scenarios tested

### Documentation
- [ ] Code is well-commented
- [ ] JSDoc/TSDoc format used
- [ ] Documentation files updated
- [ ] Examples are clear and complete
- [ ] Links to related resources included
- [ ] No outdated references

### Alignment
- [ ] Follows DEVELOPER_GUIDE.md patterns
- [ ] Follows TESTING_GUIDE.md practices
- [ ] Meets SECURITY.md requirements
- [ ] Follows PERFORMANCE.md recommendations
- [ ] Uses ARCHITECTURE.md patterns
- [ ] Complies with CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md

## PR Template Notes

- Keep PR scope focused (avoid mixing unrelated changes)
- Reference related issues using `Closes #123`
- If unsure about anything, ask in comments
- Be responsive to feedback and review comments
- Request re-review after making changes
